note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Simpletag
tagline: Simple jquery photo tagging plugin. Based on imgareaselect plugin.
body:
Simpletag, a simple photo tagging plugin for Jquery =================================================== Simple jquery photo tagging plugin. Based on imgareaselect plugin. Initial build, only based on what i need. Further development will include additional feature to simplify this whole module.

Requirements :

  • Jquery (http://jquery.com/)
  • Imgareaselect (http://odyniec.net/projects/imgareaselect/)

Usage :

```javascript $("#image1").simpletag(); ```
